sentences: Pilar Montenegro (Spanish pronunciation: [piˈlaɾ monteˈneɣɾo]; born María del Pilar Montenegro López on May 31, 1972 in Mexico City, Mexico) is a Mexican Latin pop singer and actress.
When Montenegro was 10 years old she landed her first acting part in the TV series Juguemos A Cantar.

In 2001, Montenegro re-emerged into the music scene by the hand of former husband and executive music producer Jorge Reynoso, after 6 months of recording with the music production of Rudy Perez they released her second album Desahogo.
